entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Amount 15 mm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 mm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
